title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Artur Fast; Kemane Ba
raw_text: Cover Art  Mecha Collab    Artur Fast is a Kazakhstani artist currently living in Bochum, Germany. He has been a freelance artist for eight years and a concept artist for Flare Games for the last four. He is also part of LMBN, a poetry slam show, in which he creates livepaintings. His current focus is on walls and street art.
text:
Cover Art
Mecha Collab
Artur Fast is a Kazakhstani artist currently living in Bochum, Germany. He has been a freelance artist for eight years and a concept artist for Flare Games for the last four. He is also part of LMBN, a poetry slam show, in which he creates livepaintings. His current focus is on walls and street art.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Mecha Collab by Artur Fast and Kemane Ba
